long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On craigslist, it takes multiple clicks to go back and forth from selected items to the main search window. This extension for both Chrome and Firefox allows users to search more efficiently on craigslist.

Users will see that the main search window has changed a little. Now, when a user selects a category item the category results will appear inside the same viewing window to the right hand side. This allows users to view categories while simultaneously having continued access to the main search window.

Similarly, if the user wants to view additional information on an item  (i.e. sale details or contact information) they can select it and the full page for the item will appear in the lower right hand corner of the same window.

Firefox users can download it from here
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/craigslistezview/
